EmailTemplate.subject: NRF 2022: Better customer experience equals a happier customer
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Simple, made possible. Better customer experience equals a happier customer NRF 2022 | New York | 16-18 January 2022 | NCR Booth 4819 What makes a customer happy? Customer experience is the most important factor to all retailers. We know how to help you provide your customers the best-possible experiences while shopping at your store, and help you harvest valuable data analytics from transactions. NCR offers point of service solutions for every segment in retail and has fit-to-purpose applications that give associates all the tools needed to delight shoppers. You don’t have to change your POS to have high-tech capabilities, our NCR Commerce Platform brings new capabilities to our existing industry-leading solutions. Thanks to the NCR Commerce Platform, it’s easy to give shoppers choice in how they shop with you. You don’t have to sacrifice consistency, visibility, or manageability to drive demonstrable ROI with data-driven, front-end design.
